amendment.description: An amendment numbered 69 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to expand the ban on foreign money entering elections to include electioneering communications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slotkin amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A051) offered by Ms. Slotkin.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Slotkin amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
